courses.title: Python for Beginners
courses.description: Dive into computer programming basics, Python's history, applications, and its significance, including its path to AI, with practical exercises and guided projects.

courses.title: Master in Python
courses.description: Comprehensive Python course covering basics, history, applications, AI, Scratch, IDE setup, variables, control flow, functions, file handling, frameworks, with practical exercises.

courses.title: AI Tools Expertise
courses.description: Master AI tools with programming, ML, DL, neural networks, and diverse applications in healthcare, finance, image generation, NLP, computer vision, and reinforcement learning.

courses.title: Deep Learning for Beginner
courses.description: Explore Deep Learning and Machine Learning basics, covering fundamentals, Neural Networks, real-world projects, and transitions from ANN to CNN, including RNN, LSTM, Transformers.
features: Intuitive Insight into RNN, LSTM, Transformers

courses.title: Master in Deep Learning
courses.description: Master in Deep Machine Learning provides comprehensive training, covering Deep Learning basics, neural networks, optimization techniques, and real-world applications.
features: Introduction to Various Neural Network Architectures

courses.title: Machine Learning for Beginners
courses.description: Dive into essential Machine Learning concepts including algorithms like KNN, Decision Trees, and Na√Øve Bayes, along with practical Python implementation and supervised/unsupervised learning exploration.

courses.title: Master in Machine Learning
courses.description: Explore Regression, Classification, Unsupervised Learning, and Ensemble Techniques with Python implementation, covering essential concepts and practical projects.
